section_text: 1 1 The Children Act 1989 is amended as follows. 2 In section 8 (child arrangements orders and other orders with respect to children), after subsection (4)(i) insert— j Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Female Genital Mutilation Act 2003 (other than paragraph 3 of that Schedule).

2 1 This Act extends to England and Wales only. 2 This Act comes into force on the day on which it is passed. 3 This Act may be cited as the Children Act 1989 (Amendment) (Female Genital Mutilation) Act 2019.
